sentences.sentence: Does this spell the doom of the physical book?
sentences.translation: 这是否意味着实体书的末日？

sentences.sentence: "Proud and insolent youth," said Hook, "prepare to meet thy doom."
sentences.translation: “傲慢无礼的年轻人，”胡克说，“准备迎接你的厄运吧。”

sentences.sentence: Why are people so full of gloom and doom?
sentences.translation: 人们的心里为什么满是悲观失望？
